verses.text: At the same \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will I be the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add which were\add* \w left|strong="H8300"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; \add even\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when I \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to cause him to \w rest|strong="H7280"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* of \w old|strong="H7350"\w* unto me, \add saying\add*, Yea, I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thee with an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*: therefore with \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* have I \w drawn|strong="H4900"\w* thee.\f + \fr 31.3 \ft of…: Heb. from afar\f*\f + \fr 31.3 \ft with lovingkindness…: have I extended lovingkindness unto thee\f*

Again I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee, and thou shalt be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou shalt again be \w adorned|strong="H5710"\w* with thy \w tabrets|strong="H8596"\w*, and shalt go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w dances|strong="H4234"\w* of them that make \w merry|strong="H7832"\w*.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft tabrets: or, timbrels\f*

Thou shalt yet \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vines|strong="H3754"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: the \w planters|strong="H5193"\w* shall \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*, and shall eat \add them\add* as common \w things|strong="H2490"\w*.\f + \fr 31.5 \ft eat…: Heb. profane them\f*

For there shall \w be|strong="H3426"\w* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w watchmen|strong="H5341"\w* upon the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* ye, and let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w Sing|strong="H7442"\w* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* for \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w shout|strong="H6670"\w* among the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* ye, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them from the \w coasts|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \add and\add* with them the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* and the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, the woman with \w child|strong="H2030"\w* and her that travaileth with \w child|strong="H3205"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thither.

They shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, and with \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* will I \w lead|strong="H2986"\w* them: I will cause them to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in a \w straight|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, wherein they shall not \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*: for I am a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is\add* my \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.\f + \fr 31.9 \ft supplications: or, favours\f*

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* in the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* afar \w off|strong="H4801"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, He that \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* him, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* him, as a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \add doth\add* his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w ransomed|strong="H1350"\w* him from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \add him that was\add* \w stronger|strong="H2389"\w* than he.

Therefore they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* in the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and shall flow \w together|strong="H5102"\w* to the \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for \w wheat|strong="H1715"\w*, and for \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and for \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and for the \w young|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* and of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*: and their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be as a \w watered|strong="H7302"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*; and they shall not \w sorrow|strong="H1669"\w* any \w more|strong="H3254"\w* at all.

Then shall the \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in the \w dance|strong="H4234"\w*, both young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* and \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: for I will \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* their \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* into \w joy|strong="H8342"\w*, and will \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* them, and make them \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* from their \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*.

And I will \w satiate|strong="H7301"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* with \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*, and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with my \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; A \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w*, \add and\add* \w bitter|strong="H8563"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*; \w Rahel|strong="H7354"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* for her \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* for her \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, because they \add were\add* not.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w Refrain|strong="H4513"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*: for thy \w work|strong="H6468"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w rewarded|strong="H7939"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and they shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

And there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* in thine \w end|strong="H0319"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to their own \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

¶ I have \w surely|strong="H8085"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w bemoaning|strong="H5110"\w* himself \add thus;\add* Thou hast \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* me, and I was \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w*, as a \w bullock|strong="H5695"\w* \w unaccustomed|strong="H3808"\w* \add to the yoke:\add* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thou me, and I shall be \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*; for thou \add art\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Surely \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that I was \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*, I \w repented|strong="H5162"\w*; and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that I was \w instructed|strong="H3045"\w*, I \w smote|strong="H5606"\w* upon \add my\add* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*: I was \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, yea, even \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*, because I did \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\add Is\add* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* my \w dear|strong="H3357"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? \add is he\add* a \w pleasant|strong="H8191"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*? for \w since|strong="H1767"\w* I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against him, I do \w earnestly|strong="H2142"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* him still: therefore my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* are \w troubled|strong="H1993"\w* for him; I will \w surely|strong="H7355"\w* have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon him, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 31.20 \ft are…: Heb. sound\f*

Set thee \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w waymarks|strong="H6725"\w*, \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee high \w heaps|strong="H8564"\w*: \w set|strong="H7896"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* toward the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*, \add even\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add which\add* thou \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w*: turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to these thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ How long wilt thou go \w about|strong="H2559"\w*, O thou \w backsliding|strong="H7728"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*? for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w created|strong="H1254"\w* a new \w thing|strong="H2319"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, A \w woman|strong="H5347"\w* shall \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* a \w man|strong="H1397"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; As yet they shall \w use|strong="H0559"\w* this \w speech|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof, when I shall bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* their \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*; The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, O \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \add and\add* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.

And there shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* itself, and in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w husbandmen|strong="H0406"\w*, and they \add that\add* go \w forth|strong="H5265"\w* with \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w*.

For I have \w satiated|strong="H7301"\w* the \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and I have \w replenished|strong="H4390"\w* every \w sorrowful|strong="H1669"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
Upon this I \w awaked|strong="H6974"\w*, and \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*; and my \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* was \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w* unto me.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* with the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and with the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* like as I have watched \w over|strong="H8245"\w* them, to pluck \w up|strong="H5428"\w*, and to break \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and to throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w*, and to \w afflict|strong="H7489"\w*; so will I watch \w over|strong="H8245"\w* them, to \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, and to \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* no more, The \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* a sour \w grape|strong="H1155"\w*, and the \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* are set on \w edge|strong="H6949"\w*.

But every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for his own \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* the sour \w grape|strong="H1155"\w*, his \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* shall be set on \w edge|strong="H6949"\w*.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and with the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*:

Not according to the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that I \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* I \w took|strong="H2388"\w* them by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to bring them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; which my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* they \w brake|strong="H6565"\w*, although I was an \w husband|strong="H1166"\w* unto them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 31.32 \ft although…: or, should I have continued an husband unto them?\f*

But this \add shall be\add* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* with the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w After|strong="H0310"\w* those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in their inward \w parts|strong="H7130"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* it in their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*; and will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And they shall \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* no more every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for they shall all \w know|strong="H3045"\w* me, from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* of them unto the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* of them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for I will \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and I will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* no more.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* for a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \add and\add* the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* and of the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* for a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, which \w divideth|strong="H7280"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* when the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof \w roar|strong="H1993"\w*; The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

If those \w ordinances|strong="H2706"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add then\add* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* also shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from being a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; If \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* can be \w measured|strong="H4058"\w*, and the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* searched \w out|strong="H2713"\w* \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*, I will also cast \w off|strong="H3988"\w* all the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for all that they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Hananeel|strong="H2606"\w* unto the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.

And the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w line|strong="H6957"\w* shall yet go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* over against it upon the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* \w Gareb|strong="H1619"\w*, and shall compass \w about|strong="H5437"\w* to \w Goath|strong="H1601"\w*.

And the whole \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of the dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w*, and of the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w*, and all the \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* unto the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*, unto the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \add shall be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; it shall not be plucked \w up|strong="H5428"\w*, nor thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w* any more for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
